hits.definition:
传 (F 傳)

[chuán] pass, pass on;

    传统 chuántǒng tradition

[zhuàn] Confucian classic

红 (F 紅)

[hóng] (= 红色 hóngsè) red;

    东方红 Dōngfānghóng The East is Red

[gōng] 女红 nǚgōng needlework

达 (F 達)

[dá] reach, arrive

[dā] <referring to sounds of clocks or footsteps>

[tà] 挑达 tāotà walk casually to and fro

候

[hòu] (= 时候 shíhou) time, wait, situation

父

[fù] (= 父亲 fùqin) father;

    父母 fùmǔ parents

[fǔ] old man

强 (F 強, 彊)

[qiáng] strong

[qiǎng] strive

[jiàng] 倔强 juéjiàng stubborn, unbending
